alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 224 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over McIntosh, or near Hinesville, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Hinesville, Richmond Hill, Hunter Army Airfield, Coffee Bluff, Midtown Savannah, Downtown Savannah, McIntosh and Montgomery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty
